website_summaries.verdict: It's not the most glamorous offering, but it gets the job done. It's thick, but it doesn't have an overpowering scent or fragrance.
pros: Made with shea butter, coconut oil and avocado butter
cons: Can be hard to apply when the tube is warm

customer_reviews.title: For a "natural" product - sure tastes like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Banana Boat and Aloe Gator lip balm for quite some time, but like many folks always like to look for more natural options. We use Coola as sunscreen right now, so decided to try the lip balm as well. In summary, if you have ever used their sunscreen, you will know that the aerosol has a chemical smell to it when you put it on. I would not think that they would do the same thing on the lip balm as it goes "in your mouth". In summary, i would not recommend this product and will not be purchasing it again moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rick

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I am very dry: eyes, lips, skin, mouth. Cola goes on thicker and stays on longest of any lip product I’ve used. Yes, I balk at the $$$, but my lips are comfortable with no peeling or cracking because I use Coola day and night. One is in my purse. One is on my bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Talk

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the costs.
customer_reviews.text: I received on Feb 21st and no joke by March 8th. It’s was empty.. what a rip off. It’s was an ok lim balm. Nothing special. Especially for lasting less than two weeks. I rather go to tarjay and buy the Brts beees 4pack for $10.
customer_reviews.author: SceneOne4teen

customer_reviews.title: Awful Taste
customer_reviews.text: This lip balm puts an awful taste in my mouth when it gets absorbed (about 10 minutes or so after putting it on). I was surprised because it smells good but it consistently has this awful chemically taste even as someone who generally doesn’t get and lip balm in their mouth. I couldn’t keep using it. The lip balm was also considerably smaller than I thought it would be from the pictures and prices. I guess that one is on me though for not reading the dimensions. The price seems pretty high for a small tube of lip balm. It did hold up well in my hot car though so that’s something.
customer_reviews.author: GVM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balm
customer_reviews.text: Really a perfect suncreen / lip balm! Non toxic, no taste, no fragrance, white residue at ALL! Not sticky or greasy either, just a nice invisible balm that is more matte than glossy, so it makes a great lipstick base too. The lid twists onto the base securely, so it's great for your beach bag or purse.
customer_reviews.author: MWTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: So thankful for this product. Recently moved to Texas and spend every weekend on the lake. My lips were getting sun burned every week. I’ve had mine for 3 months, but only use when I’m on the lake- for the reference to reviewers who say it doesn’t last. Only down side is in 99+ temps it MELTS!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Bad Taste
customer_reviews.text: I live in California and I am always outside. I figured I would try this brand because I have a moisturizer from them. The smell is great but there is a nasty aftertaste. I tried it and 5 minutes goes by and I had to wash my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Renee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Clear, glides on, works!
customer_reviews.text: After getting badly burned lips on one trip (swollen and peeling!) I decided to buy the COOLA lip balm for a recent trip. LOVE IT! It's clear, so just makes it looks like you have regular lip balm or light gloss on. There's no real scent or flavor, other than perhaps a slight/mild pleasant one. No burns on this last trip! And lips felt nicely moisturized. My lips get easily irritated with most lip balms, but no problems with this one!
customer_reviews.author: sunny_hopes

customer_reviews.title: Good SPF
customer_reviews.text: I live in Hawaii so am always trying to protect my skin as best as I can. I like this product for its ease of application- meaning it goes on smooth. The smell is mild and pleasant, but I have to admit that there is a slight medicinal taste like you're applying actual suncreen on your lips. Not sure if its unavoidable but because of this, I only use it when I need a definite SPF.
customer_reviews.author: 808bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Smelled nice, tasted like soap
customer_reviews.text: Smelled nice, but had an unfortunate soapy taste after a few minutes of wear. Asked my husband to try it and he did not have the same experience, so I think it has something to do with my body chemistry. Did not end up wearing it outside, so I can't comment on the sun protection ability. Impressive packaging though, really liked that the cap was threaded so it didn't pop off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Thegirlontheleft

customer_reviews.title: Didn't protect from sun
customer_reviews.text: My husband gets sun blisters on his lips if he is the sun without protection. I was looking for a more natural less toxic sunscreen chapstick. I've heard great things about coola so decided to try the chapstick with spf. He spent one day out in the boat, he reapplied religiously during the day. He got a huge blister on his lip 2 days later. Back to the cheap junk... at least it works
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Wipf

customer_reviews.title: Love it but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff. It doesn't make my lips even drier, like some chap sticks do for me after a while. However, I put this on maybe twice a day and the tube only last be about a month. It's soooo little of an amount. I really wish COOLA would consider giving you more of a stick considering the price. I won't be reordering for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nutshell👍❣️
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this suntan lotion!!️♥️ Finally a suntan lotion that doesn’t break my face out. Love how it isn’t greasy!!️ Love how it is organic and the anti aging component is a plus ❤️ Love the lip protection too ~ you don’t even know your wearing it. In a 🥜 nutshel : protect 💋❣️♥️🤙
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Jane

customer_reviews.title: I bought this after having been very pleased w/ COOLA's mineral tinted unscented SPF 30 BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after having been very pleased w/ COOLA's mineral tinted unscented SPF 30 BB cream. I have another sensitive skin brand lip SPF product, but it goes on white & is extremely thick, pasty, so I don't like to wear it for everyday activities. This COOLA SPF lip balm goes on smoothly, feels nice on the lips, & does not have an unpleasant taste. I also like the fact that the container closes securely, so I'm not worried about it coming open in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lottie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I actually don’t think this product is bad!! I was a little hesitant with the reviews, but decided to make the buy. I’m very happy I did! My lips didn’t get burned like they normally do. I wouldn’t necessarily say it’s moisturizing...... but it’s definitely protective. It’s not greasy and to ME there is no taste.......maybe if you’re super sensitive to taste you won’t like it, but to me it was not noticeable enough to hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Goes on easily without a waxy feel & has a pleasant taste. I was out in the 80 degree sun yesterday for over 3 hours. I would re-apply after eating & drinking. No sunburned lips!
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: Great product with perfect texture
customer_reviews.text: I'm super picky about the texture of a lip balm with or without SPF but this one is great. It's smooth and moisturizing and not tacky/sticky at all. Glides on nicely and stays on for a reasonable period of time. It also has the added bonus of being a part of Coola's socially/environmentally conscious products.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: If you need a cruelty free lip lip balm with spf this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after I experienced sun burn on my lips for the first time - NOT PLEASANT. The price is a little high in my opinion but it's a really nice quality and has a pleasent smell. Does it's job and my lips are always protected now.
customer_reviews.author: L Adams

customer_reviews.title: Broken sunblock stick
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really review the product because I was not able to use it. All of the sunblock product is stuck in the top of the stick, completely broken off from the base. It was delivered like this. I am very disappointed. I will try to order a different brand and see if I have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda B. Dundore

customer_reviews.title: BEST SUNSCREENS ON THE MARKET!!!
customer_reviews.text: This brand of sunscreens is the best I have ever had on my body! I’m an avid offshore and marsh fisherwoman an there is no shade. This product outweighs any other sunscreen whether lip or body by miles! The old fact “you get what you pay for” in this case is true. Maybe a little higher in price than others but for the protection - nothing compares!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mara

customer_reviews.title: Good but don’t leave in the heat
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and really like this product. The main issue is that it melts with little or no exposure to heat. Definitely could not be left in the car or beach bag. Would suggest throwing it in the cooler if needed to transport. Feels great going on and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lee

customer_reviews.title: so I blew $10 on this horribly tasting chapstick
customer_reviews.text: This chapstick tastes ridiculously gross. They do not accept returns...so I blew $10 on this horribly tasting chapstick.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is great, but the container is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, but the container is terrible. The bottom breaks. I've had two, both had the same exact problem. the white bottom comes detached on first or second use. if they fix the container, this would be awesom.
customer_reviews.author: DaveJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: As advertised it does not cake which is a great feature. I use it for golf. I suggest re-applying every 2 hours under extreme sun and to keep the protection at max.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Denis

customer_reviews.title: Baby soft lips
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite chapsticks. It is seriously SO moisturizing and lasts a long time. My lips are overall softer and more hydrated when using this. And the smell is heavenly. The high spf is definitely a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Araceli G.

customer_reviews.title: Best lip protector out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best chapstick I have found and I have tried just about every brand there is! I love that it is thick and lasts but is not sticky
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: so I needed to find a new favorite. Love this one
customer_reviews.text: I am so picky with my chapstick and I use it all day every day. I was using the Sephora lip moisturizer until I just realized it's been discontinued, so I needed to find a new favorite. Love this one. I will continue to use it especially because of the SPF 30. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip Protection/Tastes like sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Finding a vegan/cruelty free lip balm with SPF is very hard! This product is great if you are looking for that. It moisturizes and protects. However it has a very strong taste that is tolerable but not the best. I would recommend this more for when you are spending long hours in the sun than for everyday sitting at your desk inside away from the sun use.
customer_reviews.author: Ayana

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from cold sores from the sun and have a hard time finding a product that protects my lips when hanging in the sun. This product is AMAZING! I use it even when I won't be in the sun :) It stays on for a great amount of time (I reapply often, only because my lips are sensitive to the sun) but it's wonderful and effective!
customer_reviews.author: Liz B

customer_reviews.title: Says it is unscented but it is HIGHLY flavored and therefore...scented
customer_reviews.text: It has a strong scent and flavor, like an artificial fruit punch. It says the product is unscented but there is "flavor" in the ingredients and it is strong and unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Hydrating, but not greasy or waxy. I wear or alone and under lipstick or colored glosses. I have very fair and sensitive skin and my lips freckle, burn, and blister on the sun very easily. This has been a lifesaver this summer. Better protection for my lips than my regular facial sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: So much better than other brands!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! It keeps my lips from getting sunburned and has a unique cap that screws on and off so sand doesn’t get in it while using at the beach Definitely reccomend this for anyone who hates getting chapped sun burned lips when in the sun too long!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casabella325

customer_reviews.title: Liplux delivered! I've burned my lips in strong Caribbean ...
customer_reviews.text: Liplux delivered! I've burned my lips in strong Caribbean sun-yowtch-even with other brand lip protection. I'm grateful I can apply Coola's organic liplux and pucker up with confidence. It's so smooth & hydrating as well as protecting. I'll never have Bubba lips again! Thank you Coola
customer_reviews.author: Audrey F.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This tastes horrible! Can’t believe I paid this much- shoulda stuck with banana boat. Same taste. Hard to believe it’s organic. Never again. Doesn’t even deserve one star.
customer_reviews.author: Polly LePine

customer_reviews.title: Interesting scent but super moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: So I’ll be honest I don’t know how I feel about the vanilla mint combo, but the product itself is super moisturizing. My one complaint is that it doesn’t sink in quickly enough, and it leaves your lips a little greasy. It’s great for being out the sun or for before bed, but otherwise leaves some greasy residue.
customer_reviews.author: JMarie17

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried their products before and try and get more natural and environmentally friendly products as much as I can. I was initially apprehensive about the smell but I have really enjoyed this ans it really does a good job of keeping lips hydrated! Definitely on the expensive side but I don’t use other lip products and especially with an upcoming winter, I’m looking forward to challenging it.
customer_reviews.author: Noa Iacob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunscreen in a tube
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this as a sunscreen. Goes on smoothly & really has helped me as I am a sun lover
customer_reviews.author: maryelen

customer_reviews.title: Super hydrating lip balm!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best lip balms I've ever tried! It's worth the cost and I love how it makes my lips feel.
customer_reviews.author: SUZAC29

customer_reviews.title: So creamy and long lasting! I have very sun ...
customer_reviews.text: So creamy and long lasting! I have very sun sensitive lips and this stick has kept me protected all Winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Winter

customer_reviews.title: Best lip moisturizer & sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Necessity item! Feels great & SPF 30, doesn’t get much better than this
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Tastes awful BUT. It really works. Keep my lips from getting sun blister.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: I did not like
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big lip balm user. I did not like this. Did not seem to leave my lips moist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great lip balm. It has a good rating sunscreen and goes on very smooth. Feels great on the lips. Not sticky and it's invisible, not white! I'll order this again for sure
customer_reviews.author: rlhinca

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen Bal
customer_reviews.text: Good lip balm. It tastes a little bit like sunscreen and I wouldn’t say it’s necessarily better than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: James Magnusson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this, goes on so well and lasts!!!!! I am a Chap Stick girl to the extreme, but tried this due to reviews and really love it. Glides on smoothly, no waxy feel at all, and really LASTS. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki of CA

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Moisturizes my lips and keeps them from burning. I keep one in my purse and one in my beach bag. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Melted
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it melted and re-solidified at some point. It’s still usable but I was disappointed. If I buy again it’ll be in store to avoid this problem.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaRN87

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling lip balm with sunscreen that doesn't taste like ick!
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling lip balm with sunscreen that doesn't taste like ick! Feels great on, stays on long time and is safe for my body to wear, cruelty free which is a must in my house and works well as a sunscreen for the lips even when in water. I often can get very chapped and blistered lips when in the sun and water and especially in salt water. On our last trip to Hawaii when I was in the sun and the water and ocean a lot I never got chapped or blistered lips. This was a first and I am now always keeping this on my body, in my purse and in my travels bags.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lip balm. It is a bit expensive but it works great. I like that the lid screws on so it won't pop off in my bag/purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn D

customer_reviews.title: No harsh taste
customer_reviews.text: I love using this out on the water. It doesn't smell or have a gross taste like most sunscreen Chapsticks.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. Never will go back to anything else
customer_reviews.text: Everything in the Coola lineup are fantastic. This lip balm is the bomb!! Just awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Secret Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all months not just summer
customer_reviews.text: So moisturizing!! My favorite sun screen for my lips. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Maddiemads

customer_reviews.title: Lip Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Best lip sunscreen ever! I’ve tried the over-the-counter stuff and none compare! It does a fantastic job of protecting my lips, while keeping the moist at the same time. None of that waxy feeling that is so common with lip balms.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Shay

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍❤️
customer_reviews.text: Lips feels nice and moisturize and it has sun protector my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth V.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This product and Supergoop are my go-to lip sunscreens. You can't go wrong with either brand.
customer_reviews.author: sandi

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Unscented, no flavor-Love!
customer_reviews.text: Unscented, yeah! Nice all around. Cover is turned so stays in place. No taste, so another yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Ashley

customer_reviews.title: drying my lip but protecting is good
customer_reviews.text: I do not how it works for others but It is drying my lip a lot. I am using it when I go out. Will finish since I started use otherwise I was looking for a one to use whole day. This one is not for whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Ulziibayar

customer_reviews.title: Great SPF
customer_reviews.text: My lips burn easy at the beach. This works really well
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Buttery texture, very portable, great feel
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my dermatologist - goes on soft and buttery, nice to have lipblock in such a portable size. Lips feel/look great.
customer_reviews.author: JKH

customer_reviews.title: So Moisture.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely smell too.Just got it today , but love this brand . And felt great on lips .
customer_reviews.author: Audrey F.

customer_reviews.title: Best chapstick ever
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product will continue to buy and spread the word
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best lip moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love the high spf and it feels so good on my lips! I’m never without it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie the Cairn Terrier's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Leaves weird after taste.
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent and the way it feels, but the after taste was bad enough I stopped using it
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Craft

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!! Just got back from a vacation in Mexico, wore it every day and my lips didn't get burnt or chapped! Not easy at all and smells good as a bonus! I also love their ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Chriswell

customer_reviews.title: Best SPF for Lips
customer_reviews.text: This is the best SPF for lips. Works well. Smooth application. Lasts a along time. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JSTAR

customer_reviews.title: cruelty-free product for those of us who love animals and need a high SFP lip product
customer_reviews.text: An effective, cruelty-free product for those of us who love animals and need a high SFP lip product. I have no complaints about the effectiveness or taste of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it.I am very pleased this this lip balm. I bought the original formula, which has a very pleasant taste, almost additive! I read about iCoola Lip Balm on a blog written by a dermatologist .Now it's my new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Nice smell that’s not overpowering. Great consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as butter!
customer_reviews.text: It's soooooo smooth! It doesn't feel waxy or heavy on my lips and the scent is yummy but not too strong. Also I LOVE the screw-off cap (no more open balm in the purse!). I don't think it has any particular flavor which isn't a bad thing
customer_reviews.author: Sam & Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This item is wonderful! It's kept my lips from getting burnt/dried/chapped. I use it daily when I go for runs and biking. It goes on great and doesn't feel like you even have anything on, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schlegel

customer_reviews.title: Smells like sunscreen - but works fine
customer_reviews.text: Has a pretty sun-screen like smell (which isn't awesome on the lips) - but works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: smag

customer_reviews.title: I love the Sunscreen but not the lip balm
customer_reviews.text: I love the Sunscreen but not the lip balm. The balm was not creamy nor easily guided on. I wish I hadn't bought it and could return it. I love their sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth
customer_reviews.text: No color but very protective in the sun. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great spf chap stick
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for active people! Love that the scent is very mild.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia M.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Feels good on your lips- much better than a chap stick type. I guess it works- didn't get fever blisters from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Edith V.

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance on lips taste gross
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want flavor on my lip from the fragrance chemicals. Plus it melted on a hot day, like all lipsticks, so it was useless after that.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection for lips
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip balm with sunscreen! It stays on my lips during hot days in the sun. This lip balm moisturizes my lips and protects me from getting cold sores. The taste doesn’t bother me and I love the scent.
customer_reviews.author: MCO

customer_reviews.title: Too Dry on the Lips
customer_reviews.text: I like Coola products, but this lip balm is just too dry on the lips.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Dubois

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand! I have one stashed in every room. I purchased a tube for my fiance. He had severely chapped lips and everything he used was not working. After a few days, his lips are soft and kissable again. This product is not waxy or greasy and moisturizes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Patti W.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fake!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fake!!! 1 Star is too many! No label, came with a broken seal in a used container and an expiration date of 6 months ago. Do not buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lambiase

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip Balm
customer_reviews.text: This lip balm goes on thick, stays on long, with no taste and a lightly scented, pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: petunia

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found Coola
customer_reviews.text: Coola products r great, I usually have issues in the summer with other sunscreens, I break out with a rash, this is the first summer I had no rash issues. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Best lip balm with sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: No sunscreen taste, long-lasting, and moisturizing. It is pricey but it will last you through the summer or even the whole year, and worth it not to have sunburned lips. I used to use Hawaiian Tropic, which had a higher SPF but if you got any on your tongue, it was disgusting. Now I'm a Coola convert!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. Will definitely be a return to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my husband uses it everyday, his lips have not been dry or chapped
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice lip balm
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice lip balm, seems to last quite a while on my lips. No sweet smell, love the SPF 30. It costs more than the average balm, but the tube is pretty large. Fast shipping, no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and works!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth, good moisturizing and sun protection. I love that its made with safe ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Taste a bit bad doesn't moisturize that well
customer_reviews.text: Taste a bit bad doesn't moisturize that well, IMO. It protects well but for the price, I would like something a little more moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Annie ve Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love Coola!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing product with SPF30! Tastes great and protects my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE Coola's products
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE Coola's products, but especially the lip balm. I constantly have chapped lips and after years of trying countless different brands of lip balm and chap sticks and everything else under the sun, I finally came across Coola's Liplux spf 30. I like both the original and the vanilla mint, and have some with me at all times. It isn't too greasy or sticky, and the vanilla mint smells great!
customer_reviews.author: mh02145

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best SPF lip balms I have ever had. Doesn't cake, stays on and works!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad taste, too expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Nice product with effective synthetic sunscreen. I'd rate it higher except I don't use it a lot because of the taste. I know taste is a subjective thing but this one is horrible. It's also dramatically over-priced for what it is. Equally moisturizing and protecting lip balms can be found for a fraction of the price. Because SPF lip balm needs to be applied frequently, you should really fall in love with using it...and I guess I'm just not in love with this one.
customer_reviews.author: TKPics616

customer_reviews.title: it is well loved already.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a stocking stuffer Christmas gift, it is well loved already.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, but doesn't seem special enough to merit the ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, but doesn't seem special enough to merit the price. Plus after using less than a week, the stick has fallen out of the tube! So frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: There is no flavor as the review asked. Love the product have used it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: by far my favorite chapstick/sunscreen for my lips and the flavor is bomb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smooth being applied, light feel on lips, I wear it alone or under lipsticks.

customer_reviews.title: but for me it smells too much like SPF.
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this chapstick, but for me it smells too much like SPF.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chapstick with SPF! It arrived on time and exactly as advertised. I would definitely recommend this seller!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my dermatologist office for sun protection. Like a Chapstick. I think this will work well.

product_meta.title: COOLA Organic Liplux Sunscreen Lip Balm
product_meta.description:
Scent:OriginalProtect your pucker with our Liplux SPF 30 balm. This vitamin-enriched, antioxidant formula protects and conditions lips with natural fruit butters.

1
At COOLA, we're passionate about creating happy, healthy lifestyle experiences. We believe that clean beauty should feel as good as it is healthy, which is why we develop organic products that you'll love wearing every day.
